cells.data:
-- Compose a function from a simple value to a tuple of
-- the separate outputs of two different functions

-- fanArrow (&&&) :: (a -> b) -> (a -> c) -> (a -> (b, c))
on fanArrow(f, g)
    script
        on |位|(x)
            Tuple(mReturn(f)'s |位|(x), mReturn(g)'s |位|(x))
        end |位|
    end script
end fanArrow
